tyrant.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a ruler who has complete power and uses it in a cruel and unfair way
tyrant.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The country had long been ruled by tyrants.
tyrant.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who has power over other people, and uses it cruelly or unfairly
tyrant.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: My headmaster was a real tyrant.
